net.sf.wubiq.print.managers

Interface IRemotePrintJobManager

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IDirectConnectPrintJobManager

    public interface IRemotePrintJobManager
    Defines the contract of Remote print job manager. Implementations of remote print job manager decides how print jobs are stored and removed.
    Author:
    Federico Alcantara.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long addRemotePrintJob(java.lang.String queueId, IRemotePrintJob remotePrintJob)
      Add remote print job to a queue.
      int calculatePrintJobs(java.lang.String queueId, javax.print.PrintService printService, RemotePrintJobStatus status)
      Calculates the total print jobs.
      java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> getPrintJobs(java.lang.String queueId, RemotePrintJobStatus status)
      Gather the list of print job ids for the given status.
      int getPrintServicePendingJobs(java.lang.String queueId, javax.print.PrintService printService)
      Get print service pending jobs.
      IRemotePrintJob getRemotePrintJob(long jobId, boolean fullPrintJob)
      Return the instance of a print job.
      void initialize()
      Initializes the print job manager.
      boolean removeRemotePrintJob(long jobId)
      Makes the print job no more available for further usage.
      void startPrintJob(long jobId)
      Starts a print job.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize()
         throws java.lang.Exception
        Initializes the print job manager.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addRemotePrintJob

        long addRemotePrintJob(java.lang.String queueId,
                       IRemotePrintJob remotePrintJob)
        Add remote print job to a queue. The implementation of the queue is not specified, nor its behavior (LIFO, FIFO, any other).
        Parameters:
        queueId - Id of the queue that will have the print job. It can be interpreted as a print service unique identifier.
        remotePrintJob - Remote print job to manage.
        Returns:
        Print job unique id.

      • removeRemotePrintJob

        boolean removeRemotePrintJob(long jobId)
        Makes the print job no more available for further usage.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Unique id of the job to remove.
        Returns:
        True if the printJob was successfully removed.

      • getRemotePrintJob

        IRemotePrintJob getRemotePrintJob(long jobId,
                                  boolean fullPrintJob)
        Return the instance of a print job.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Id of the job to find.
        fullPrintJob - if true, just read remote print object must be returned.
        Returns:
        IRemotePrintJob object or null if not found.

      • getPrintJobs

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> getPrintJobs(java.lang.String queueId,
                                                  RemotePrintJobStatus status)
        Gather the list of print job ids for the given status. If status is null then all are retrieved.
        Parameters:
        queueId - Unique id of the queue to be read.
        status - Status to be search for. Null indicates all.
        Returns:
        A collection of job ids. Never null.

      • getPrintServicePendingJobs

        int getPrintServicePendingJobs(java.lang.String queueId,
                               javax.print.PrintService printService)
        Get print service pending jobs.
        Parameters:
        queueId - Unique id of the queue to be read.
        printService - Print service to poll.
        Returns:
        Number of pending jobs for the printer.

      • calculatePrintJobs

        int calculatePrintJobs(java.lang.String queueId,
                       javax.print.PrintService printService,
                       RemotePrintJobStatus status)
        Calculates the total print jobs.
        Parameters:
        queueId - Id of the associated queue.
        printService - Print service to calculate the total print jobs.
        status - Status of the requested print job. If null ALL print jobs should be counted.
        Returns:
        Total number of print jobs found or null.

      • startPrintJob

        void startPrintJob(long jobId)
        Starts a print job.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Job Id to start.
